hero.title: Manage your passwords securely and easily
hero.description: PassMaster allows you to generate and store strong passwords securely. Keep all your credentials protected with military-grade encryption and access them from any device.

auth.name: Full name
auth.registerSuccess: User created successfully, you can now log in
auth.registerError: Failed to create user, please try again

dashboard.secretWordDescription: Here you can register the key word that you will need to view the saved passwords, since they are encrypted and the key word will help you decrypt them. It can be a single word or a sentence.
